name: Inplace
description: Inplace provides an easy to do editing and display at the same time where clicking the output displays the actual content.

closable.label: closable
closable.title: Displays a button to switch back to display mode.

active.label: active
active.title: Whether the content is displayed or not.

disabled.label: disabled
disabled.title: When present, it specifies that the element should be disabled.

close-icon.label: closeIcon
close-icon.title: Icon to display in the close button.

display-props.label: displayProps
display-props.title: Used to pass all properties of the HTMLDivElement to display container.

close-button-props.label: closeButtonProps
close-button-props.title: Used to pass all properties of the HTMLButtonElement to the close button.

pt.label: pt
pt.title: Used to pass attributes to DOM elements inside the component.

pt-options.label: ptOptions
pt-options.title: Used to configure passthrough(pt) options of the component.

unstyled.label: unstyled
unstyled.title: When enabled, it removes component related styles in the core.
